definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: Ge 36:16 (not Sam.; prob. gloss fr. v:Ge 36:18 Di Kau Ball al.; Holz hesitates).

Levite, rebel ag. Moses, Nu 16:1 + 10 t. Nu 16, Nu 17, Nu 26:9, Nu 26:10, Nu 27:3; in geneal. Lists Ex 6:21, Ex 6:24, 1Ch 6:7, 1Ch 6:22; ´[[בֶּן־ק]]: 1Ch 9:19; ´[[בְּנֵי־ק]]: Nu 26:11; esp. ´[[לִבְנֵי־ק]]: as company of Psalm-collectors (or singers), in titles: Ps 42:1, Ps 44:1, Ps 45:1, Ps 46:1, Ps 47:1, Ps 48:1, Ps 49:1, Ps 84:1, Ps 85:1, Ps 87:1, Ps 88:1.
a ‘son’ of Hebron, i.e. Judahite clan 1Ch 2:43 Koree, etc.
